studio.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a room where television and radio programmes are made and broadcast or where music is recorded
studio.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a film company or the buildings it owns and uses to make its films
studio.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Depardieu is making a film with one of the big Hollywood studios.
studio.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a room where a painter or photographer regularly works
studio.translation[0].definitions[3].def: a room where dancing lessons are given or that dancers use to practise in
studio.translation[0].definitions[4].def: a small apartment with one main room
